title: So Bots
body:
My GF was playing a bot game the Other night, and she ran into a bot that was a Sivir, and low and behold the bots haven't changed in years.

Walking down bot lane, and spamming abilities on cooldown like no real player would (this is what the ARAM bot does FYI).

But hey, it is really hard to detect these bots, it only takes half an ass to spot them in any game.
